title: Japan Loans to Private Sector
description: Loans to Private Sector in Japan increased to 516328.60 JPY Billion in October from 513986 JPY Billion in September of 2022. Loans to Private Sector in Japan averaged 451509.46 JPY Billion from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 536555.80 JPY Billion in March of 1996 and a record low of 375948.90 JPY Billion in June of 2005. This page provides - Japan Loans to Private Sector - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Japan
